‚úÖ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Great idea, sufficiently complex to pose a challenge

‚úÖ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I like dices

‚úÖ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It's fun!
Not feasible for reverse with the "TOO MANY DICE" and "Error" cases. Also, add a few more test cases with more than one die.

Title and all sections
* The plural of "dice" is "dice", not "dices".
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dice

* "TOO MANY DICE" instead of "TOO MUCH DICES".

Goal section
* Please change "to save" to "To save".

* Please change "to avoid" to "To avoid".

* Please change "excedeed" to "exceeded".

* Please change "facesso" to "faces so".

* Please delete "we won't try any other bad type of inputs." (I think it is implied.)

* Please delete the example, as it is just repeating what is shown in Example section below. Alternatively, please add some explanation of how to reach the answer.

* Please change "ERROR" to "Error" for consistency with the actual expected output.

* Please format "TOO MANY DICE" and "Error" as {{constants}}.

Input section
* Please change [N] to [[N]].

* Please change [to_test] to [[to_test]].

* Please format "+" as a {{constant}} and remove the quotation marks.

* Please add "type of dice" after "each" for clarity.

Output section
* Please add "<<[[N]] lines>>" at the front.

* Please change the first "minus" to "minimum".

* Please format "Range" and "average" as {{constants}}.

* Please add " or {{TOO MANY DICE}} or {{Error}}" at the end.

Stub generator
* Please add a write statement (e.g. "write answer").

Thanks.

thanks for your time. 
I really appreciate . 
and sorry for my poor english mastery.
I think I applied everything.

True for the reverse , I'll remove it . 
Thanks

As I learned here , 
You should say "I like dice"

Thanks ‚ò∫Ô∏è

No worries! Thank you for following up!

Here are the comments on the revised version:

Goal section
* Please change "TOO MANY DICE" to {{TOO MANY DICE}} and remove the quotation marks.

* Please change "Error" to {{Error}} and remove the quotation marks.

Input section
* Please change [N] to [[N]].

Output section
* Please move the example to Goal section (Output section should not be too long).

Thanks again.
In case you have missed my comment, please move the example in Output section to Goal section. Thanks.
